data.title: Lloyd Barde Productions
data.text: Lloyd Barde Productions CDs FOR SALE • New List 12/20/2012 Previously Played & New CDs (• = Still Sealed) NEW & Featured, adds & key titles in BOLD ALL titles on SALE at prices shown! Shipping Prices shown at end of list... First come, first serve, limited quantities!!! email & paypal address: lloyd@well.com call your orders in • 415.924.4848 • or send email Ask about any other titles you are seeking!
